title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to ESPN NBA reporter Tim MacMahon about moves in the works for free agency. Will the Mavs try to match what the Knicks reportedly want to offer guard Jalen Brunson? ESPN investigative reporter TJ Quinn breaks down what's happening with Brittney Griner and her detainment in Russia. Plus, Los Angeles Times Columnist Bill Plaschke discusses the LA reaction to Freddie Freeman's emotional weekend in Atlanta. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to ESPN NBA reporter Tim MacMahon about moves in the works for free agency. Will the Mavs try to match what the Knicks reportedly want to offer guard Jalen Brunson? ESPN investigative reporter TJ Quinn breaks down what's happening with Brittney Griner and her detainment in Russia. Plus, Los Angeles Times Columnist Bill Plaschke discusses the LA reaction to Freddie Freeman's emotional weekend in Atlanta.
